H0.text: Which insects live in a vespiary. Bee

H1.text: Which insects live in a vespiary. Ant

H2.text: Which insects live in a vespiary. Hornet

H3.text: Which insects live in a vespiary. Wasp

A4.text: All species of social wasps construct their nests using some form of plant fiber (mostly wood pulp) as the primary material

A5.text: Yellow jackets such as Dolichovespula media and D. sylvestris prefer to nest in trees and shrubs
